title: Tara and Her Dragon Sisters: A Garden of Joy Book
description: Conny, Rosa, and Erika, three women related through body and soul, embark on unique journeys to the center of their consciousness and their hearts. There, they find Tara, each other, and the place from where everything arises and to which everything returns.“All is light, and we were at the origins of the light. We were at the place where the light gives birth to itself in a never-ending stream of joy.”
author: Andrew D'Ambrosi
